description:
After being teased by Rin and lectured by Yukio, Kuro decides to run away from home and go on an adventure.
The demonic cat begins by wandering around campus searching for something to eat - but unfortunately everyone he meets is more interested in playing with him, trying to kill him, or attempting to feed him inedible sludge!
Feeling that he has no place to call home, Kuro decides to go and visit his former master. But will he be able to get there on his own, and will he be able to find the place where he truly belongs?

titles.title: Tokubetsu Bangai Hen Kuro no Iede
特別番外編 クロの家出
